name: Cashmere
headline: Crypto wallet for web3 startups
description: Cashmere is a multisig solana wallet for enterprises to manage their digital assets. Instead of running their business from one person’s wallet, startups can use our wallet to securely manage their funds.

founders.name: Shashank Khanna, Founder
founders.description: Shashank is the co-founder and CEO of Cashmere. Before starting Cashmere, he was a software engineer at Amazon and SoFi. Shashank graduated from UCLA where he studied computer science.

raw_markdown="NEW
Earn USDC directly from your Cashmere Wallet. 
[Learn more](https://cashmere.finance/<https:/www.cashmere.finance/blog/cashmere-now-supports-castle-finance>)
[![Cashmere-cover](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/623a02953d604b25c45faac3_cashmerecover.png)](https://cashmere.finance/</>)[Features](https://cashmere.finance/<#features>)[Roadmap](https://cashmere.finance/<#Roadmap>)[Demo](https://cashmere.finance/<#Demo>)[Docs](https://cashmere.finance/<https:/docs.cashmere.finance/>)[Blog](https://cashmere.finance/</blog>)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62def6c8d87c254c9f815c17_auditedby.png)
# A Safer Wallet, 
# Built for business
Secure your corporate treasury with multi-sig actions. Send, receive, and grow your digital assets directly from your Cashmere Vault.
[**Get Started**](https://cashmere.finance/<https:/app.cashmere.finance>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e6eec769c3f35a02c242be_dashbgrd.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/623a0239df88c9e4fa21d5b9_shape-5.svg)
Trusted to manage treasuries for
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e054c94a885b5223496d2a_Million_%402x.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e054c9bfa2ffddb80007d1_slice%402x.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e054c921d0972b6226b738_opensea_%402x.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e054c9314bc04d19963030_FBreak_%402x.png)
Our investors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62ee76fb639ba116cb6db9b6_wonder.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62ee77071cef280915199b5c_y-combinator-logo-vector.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62f054205cac0a71408175c4_coinbaseventure.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62ee76fa9553282c4d4ffe29_soma.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62f0530af4eb676864fb514c_624c7eb4cdd4539c7bd8c0e4_Logo%20-%20FBG%20Capital.jpeg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62f052ca0b52a622f7e688ff_notation-logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62f054e0f4eb670fa0fb61a5_volt.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62f05378f4eb677816fb5647_logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e0782e9e7a48ed1cf756a9_forTeams.png)
## For 
## Teams
Secure, Stake, Grow! Set team approvals and easily make team decisions to build trust with shared treasury ownership.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e14216397eadf973464004_Airdrop_%402x.png)
## For 
## NFT Creators
Collective Ownership, Airdrops and Integrations. Manage your collection as a collective, and create bulk actions to efficiently manage your NFT community.
## For 
## Degens
Don’t get rugged! Secure your NFT collection and assets. Create multiple wallets and setup secondary approvals on your transactions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e07ee85a47c70170603653_Degens_%402x.png)
## Integrations across the Solana Ecosystem
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e08103fd4f35363dd4e05b_ecosystem_%402x.png)
## We’re building...
[Request a feature![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e6e4882fdfe1b0907972f8_Arrow_right_black.svg)](https://cashmere.finance/<https:/cashmere.canny.io/feature-requests>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e6b68ee1a61cd24cf76af9_Check-circle.svg)
Staking Tokens
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e6b68ee1a61cd24cf76af9_Check-circle.svg)
Swaps
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e6b68ee1a61cd24cf76af9_Check-circle.svg)
Mobile Notifications
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e6b68e1cbbc71f6f347a7c_Clipboard-check.svg)
Scheduled Payments
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e6b68e1cbbc71f6f347a7c_Clipboard-check.svg)
Automatic Approvals
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e6b68e1cbbc71f6f347a7c_Clipboard-check.svg)
Slack Integration for Notifications
## FAQs
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e08329b75d56a793143ca3_plus.png)How do I deposit funds in my Cashmere wallet?](https://cashmere.finance/<#>)
In your preferred wallet or exchange, you can input the Vault Address displayed in the top right of the dashboard and send funds accordingly. You can hit the copy button to add it to your clipboard.‍If you’re depositing for the first time, the Cashmere wallet may not be identified by some platforms as a valid address, for your own safety. In this case, use our UI to (1) connect your browser-friendly wallet, (2) click our **Deposit** button, and (3) input how much of which token you want to deposit and then hit **Submit**.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e08329b75d56a793143ca3_plus.png)What is an ATA or why do I have to make an Associated Token Account?](https://cashmere.finance/<#>)
For each token contained in a wallet, there exists a distinct token account associated with each mint. This means that with x different types of tokens, there exists x different token accounts. If you are sending tokens to yourself or another recipient, you may be depositing a token into that wallet for the first time so there does not exist a compatible account. In that case, you will need to create the associated token account on behalf of the user for the token transfer to succeed.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e08329b75d56a793143ca3_plus.png)Why is the address in the URL different from the vault address on my dashboard?](https://cashmere.finance/<#>)
The address in the URL is an internal multisig identifier that you don't need to be concerned with. If you are depositing funds, please use the Vault Address shown in the dashboard top right with the copy button or deposit using our Deposit interface. This can be a point of confusion but we're working towards simplifying the url to make things clearer.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e08329b75d56a793143ca3_plus.png)How do I send funds from my Cashmere wallet?](https://cashmere.finance/<#>)
There are a couple ways to reach the transfer page for a token. In the main Assets page, you can click **Transfer** under any of the tokens or you can click the **Send** button in the upper right. Simply input the wallet address you want to send tokens to and fill out the transaction info.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e08329b75d56a793143ca3_plus.png)How to do I view my deposits?](https://cashmere.finance/<#>)
Currently, to view the deposit history for your Cashmere multisig wallet, navigate to the Transactions page and click on the Solscan or Solana Explorer link. To view the aggregate of your deposits and transactions, you can simply go to your Assets page. If your deposit is not showing up, make sure (1) you sent the tokens to the Vault Address in the top right of the dashboard, (2) for developers your wallet is connected to mainnet, or (3) wait a few min before worrying to see if the transaction was slow and then message us on Discord for further support.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e08329b75d56a793143ca3_plus.png)I'm having issues, what do I do?](https://cashmere.finance/<#>)
Please reach out to us on our Discord and report bugs or any issues you’re having! We’d love to help. You can also reach out to us on Twitter if you'd prefer.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623a0239df88c9bb4e21d570/62e08329b75d56a793143ca3_plus.png)Who founded the company?](https://cashmere.finance/<#>)
Fully doxxed, Charlotte McGinn and Shashank Khanna. You can easily reach us on LinkedIn or through our Cashmere Twitter.

generated_description:
Cashmere is a promising startup in the Web3 space, founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's W22 batch. Based in San Francisco, this small but impactful team of three aims to redefine how startups manage their digital assets with a focus on security and collaboration. 

Initially conceived as a multisig wallet for Solana, Cashmere is crafted exclusively for enterprises. The concept here is simple yet revolutionary: rather than relying on a single individual's wallet—which poses risks—startups can use Cashmere's secure multsignature wallet to handle their funds. This not only elevates security through shared control but also facilitates better decision-making among team members.

The mission of Cashmere extends beyond just wallet functionalities; they provide features that cater to a range of users, from corporate teams managing their treasuries to NFT creators and individual investors. They're tackling issues common in the crypto space, such as securing assets and easing transaction processes.

Recently, Cashmere launched a feature allowing users to earn USDC directly from their wallets, reflecting their commitment to constantly evolving and adding value to their service. 

The company’s website—[cashmere.finance](https://cashmere.finance)—serves as a comprehensive hub for features, a roadmap of upcoming functionalities, and resources like documentation and a blog. They also highlight their investor backing, which notably includes Y Combinator and Coinbase Ventures, signaling confidence in their vision.

With tags like 'DeFi', 'Crypto-Web3', and 'DAO', and a future steeped in innovation, Cashmere is clearly positioning itself to be a key player in the growing world of decentralized finance. Their approachable ethos invites teams and individuals alike to explore a more secure way of managing crypto assets, fostering trust and collaboration. In a world where digital asset management can seem elusive, Cashmere is making strides to simplify it—one wallet at a time.
